title: Suspect: 'I'm sorry' for Penn murders; mystery Cancun vacation death
itunes:title: Suspect: 'I'm sorry' for Penn murders; mystery Cancun vacation death
description:
A Pennsylvania man confessed & apologized for killing 4 men. Psychologist Caryn Stark & reporter Jamie Stover join Nancy Grace on this story. A dream Cancun vacation turns tragic for a Wisconsin family. Why did police not probe the death of the daughter after an unexplained poolside incident. Radio host David Mack discusses the case with Grace. Blaze reporter Robin Walensky talks about not-so-bright bride who forgot an important detail before hiring a hitman to kill her groom.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
